public static String downloadUpdate(String addr,
                                    String ver,
                                    String url)
                             throws IOException
Tell MDD to download an new version of itself and blocks whilst MDD does it

Parameters:
addr - String containing address of MDD
ver - String containing new version
url - String containing url of new tarball
Returns:
String containing the filename of the downloaded file or 'FAILED' if the download failed
Throws:
IOException

getVideos

public static ArrayList<Video> getVideos(String addr,
                                         int viddir,
                                         String subdir)
                                  throws IOException
Static method, retrieves a list of Videos

Parameters:
addr - String containing address of MDD
viddir - which video dir(s) to look in (could be a : separated list)
subdir - String containing directory to enumerate, pass "ROOT" for the root video directory
Returns:
ArrayList of Videos
Throws:
IOException

streamFile

public static void streamFile(String addr,
                              String file,
                              String sg,
                              int w,
                              int h,
                              int enc,
                              int vb,
                              int ab)
                       throws IOException
Ask MDD to stream a file, SDP will be at http://addr:5554/stream

Parameters:
addr - String containing address of MDD
file - String containing path to the file
w - int representing desired width of video in pixels
h - int representing desired height of video in pixels
enc - int representing the desired encoding complexity (0-2)
vb - int representing desired bitrate of video in kb/s
ab - int representing desired bitrate of audio in kb/s
Throws:
IOException

getCutList

public static int[][] getCutList(String addr,
                                 Program prog)
                          throws IOException
Get a cutlist for a recording

Parameters:
addr - String containing address of MDD
prog - Program to get cutlist for
Returns:
Array of cuts represented as 2 element arrays. The first element is the start frame, the second is the end frame
Throws:
IOException
